testcase.classname: Meals and Accommodation Add Extra Charges functionality for Vessel Manager
testcase.name: Add valid description and Price - Add Extra Charge
testcase.system-out: Given open Vessel Manager login with valid user credentials.................passed Then go to Personnel menu...................................................passed Then access Meals and Accommodation sub menu................................passed Then validate if the current url is correct.................................passed Then input valid date range period and click on submit button...............passed Then click on Include Persons on the Report.................................passed Then click on a specific personnel..........................................passed Then click on the positive icon to Add Extra charges........................passed Then input a description - Extra charge first line..........................passed Then input Price - Extra charge first line..................................passed Then click Add another item button five times...............................passed Then input a description - Extra charge second line.........................passed Then input Price - Extra charge second line.................................passed Then input a description - Extra charge third line..........................passed Then input Price - Extra charge third line..................................passed Then input a description - Extra charge fourth line.........................passed Then input Price - Extra charge fourth line.................................passed Then input a description - Extra charge fifth line..........................passed Then input Price - Extra charge fifth line..................................passed Then click on Save Changes button...........................................passed Then validate if the confirmation message for successfully saving the Extra charges will display.passed And browser will close......................................................passed
